welcome_message_body: "Welcome to beautiful Benicia, the charming city known for its picturesque views, rich history, and friendly locals. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring and experiencing all that our city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Buchanan Field Airport serves domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Sacramento Mather Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all commercial flights and features a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal caters to private jet owners and offers exclusive services and facilities.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Travis AFB Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Travis AFB Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for up to 2 hours.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Air Terminal Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Air Terminal Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.
